EmailTemplate.description: Initial Case Acknowledgement for Military Quoting (System)
EmailTemplate.name: Case Acknowledgement for Military Quoting
EmailTemplate.subject: Request for Military Quote {!Case.CaseNumber},
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Date: {!Case.Today_Date__c} Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Request for Military Quote Information Only â€“ No action required
Dear Customer, We have received your Request for Military Quote.
At this time, military quotes are not available in MyAerospace Portal Quote Status and will be provided directly to this email address.
For questions or status on this quote, you can click the button below.
Thank you for the opportunity to provide a quote for this request. Visit MyAerospace to take advantage of 24x7 Price and Availability, Quote Status, Order Placement and Order Status.
Thank you,
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support
{!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
